actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 95-1449.
Measure laid on table in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill H.R. 12303 to amend title VIII of the Public Health Service Act to extend for two fiscal years the program of assistance for nurse training, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 12303 (Nurse Training assistance extension).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill H.R. 12303 to amend title VIII of the Public Health Service Act to extend for two fiscal years the program of assistance for nurse training, and for other purposes.
